title: Providing relief to the affected persons due to the acquisition of lands  for the construction of a New Railway Track from Kurunegala to Habarana via Dambulla
decision_details: - An extent of approximately 300 acres will have to be acquired for the project for the construction of a new Railway Track 84 kms in length from Kurunegala to Habarana via Dambulla under the 'Awakening Rajarata' Presidential Programme - 'Let's Awaken Polonnaruwa' District Development Programme 2016 - 2020. Accordingly, the proposal made by Hon. Nimal Siripala de Silva, the Minister of Transport and Civil Aviation, to follow the special procedure adopted in respect of the payment of compensation for the the acquisition of lands for large scale projects, with a view to carrying out the acquisition activities expeditiously without an interruption, in order to make a more justifiable compensation for the persons who are affected due to the acquisition of their lands, was approved by the Cabinet.
